text: How do I return an item
response: Returns are easy! You have 30 days to return most items. Just go to your order history, select the item, and choose 'Return Item'. We'll provide a prepaid shipping label!

text: I'm not satisfied with my purchase
response: I'm sorry to hear that! Your satisfaction is our priority. Please tell me what went wrong, and I'll do everything I can to make it right. Would you like a return, exchange, or refund?
